name: Boogie Bot pre-alpha demo
description:
Boogie bot press kit     From the end games

Bot-Tom’s battery (health) is constantly draining, the player must collect CDs, which add health with each pick-up. The boogie meter fills when Bot-Tom runs to the right or drains when he stands still. Use this boogie energy for special abilities like slow motion, wave-dash and healing. With a 100% charge the player can unleash the super boogie, going invincible  while Bot-Tom’s speed increases. Bot-Tom can also use wave jets, which converts battery life into upward momentum. Many of Bot-Toms abilities shoot sound waves that can harm enemies above, below or behind him. 

Gamepad controls are viewable at any time in the pause menu. You may also choose to play with mouse and keyboard or just keyboard. For now I'll list those controls here but they will be added viewable in game via a future update.

Keyboard: Move/duck - arrow keys, Jump - spacebar, slide/wave dash - 1, wave jump - 2, wave stomp - 3, super boogie - 4, wave jets - spacebar or 2 while air-born, slow-mo - tab, charge battery - Q

Keyboard & Mouse: Move/duck - wasd, Jump - spacebar, slide/wave dash - left mouse, wave jump - right mouse, wave stomp - mid mouse or W, super boogie - left shift, wave jets - spacebar or right mouse while air-born, slow-mo - tab, charge battery - Q
